reviews.text:
Train services run only one day a week on Saturday and have done since 1993, very little support from the North Lincolnshire Council who also own the station area which looks like a dump site, current train operator has no intention now of promoting this line and has a timetable that misses vital connections.

Cloud over present passenger service with some talking that it should be withdrawn and removed due to neglect.

New Community Rail Partnership has been set up but I've been blacklisted in the area due to upsetting the well respected BriggTown business partnership

Station has brand new Network Rail Footbridge which is caused controversy as it has no ramp and is in a town classed as a retirement town so large part of the population can't use it.
Who would want to get off here ?
